Title: Queensland sends more gas to Australia’s southeastern states, easing supply crunch
Description: Strong gas flows from Queensland have helped to bolster supplies in Australia’s southeastern states, where a cold snap this week increased the call on already-tight supplies of gas, causing wholesale gas prices to soar and forcing the Australia Energy Market Operator to impose price caps in several markets.
Author: CK

Title: Equinor’s shuttered Snohvit plant restarts LNG production; storage tank refilling underway
Description: Equinor’s shuttered 4.2 mtpa Snohvit LNG plant has restarted LNG production and the plant’s storage tanks are being filled ahead of the resumption of cargo loadings. The start of production comes 20 months after a fire forced the plant to stop operations
Author: CK
